_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The different levels of pleasure [sn36.1: Dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
The five kinds of sensual stimulation (a: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
